description: Number of Boolean functions of n variables from Post class F(5,inf).
references: V. Jovovic, G. Kilibarda, On the number of Boolean functions in the Post classes F^{mu}_8, Diskretnaya Matematika, 11 (1999), no. 4, 127-138 (translated in Discrete Mathematics and Applications, 9, (1999), no. 6).

S. Spasovski and A. M. Bogdanova, Optimization of the Polynomial Greedy Solution for the Set Covering Problem, 2013, 10th Conference for Informatics and Information Technology (CIIT 2013), http://ciit.finki.ukim.mk/data/files/spasovski/Optimization%20of%20the%20Polynomial%20Greedy%20Solution%20for%20the%20Set%20Covering%20Problem.pdf
links: Index entries for sequences related to Boolean functions
author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Goran Kilibarda
